description:
Part of me was hesitant to share about doing lyme treatment for a few reasons:⁣
⁣
~I’m doing SO much better than just even a year and a half ago. Lingering symptoms and flares ups, while challenging are bearable
⁣
~I don’t find identity in illness. Not that sharing means I do. I just have resolved a lot of trauma...still am ⁣
⁣
~Some things I just don’t feel like sharing. Healing can be very personal ⁣
⁣
For those who don’t know my journey, I started having severe neurological symptoms following a tdap shot back in June 2014. I figured out I tested positive for Lyme about two years later (it was probably dormant and got activated), and I have done several treatments since then, including SVF stem cells, herbs, ozone, IVs, DNRS, and more with EOs and emotional release. I have made HUGE progress, and if I had to just settle for where I’m at now, I could and with gratitude. ⁣
⁣
But I believe I’m being called into other areas of my purpose and other areas of healing that I haven’t made the time for. That I’ve been settling when actually God has more for me. That if I am willing and ready to receive...I CAN. ⁣
So this week I will share. Many MANY are suffering and are completely debilitated. They cannot get help, and they don’t know where to look. But I hope this spreads awareness because lyme continues to be ignored, while it’s reached epidemic numbers.
⁣
Watch my stories to see more of this journey and I’ll save in my lymestop highlight🌻 Any questions about Lyme or coinfections? Post them below or shoot me a message! 💓⬇️ .
.
.
